statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.BrandName) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteCode , AA.BrandCode , AA.BrandName , AA.BrandURL , AA.GoodsCnt
FROM dbo.TBrandInfo AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.SiteCode = #SiteCode#
AND ( AA.BrandCode = #FindText# OR AA.BrandName LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TBrandInfo AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TBrandInfo ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, SiteCode, BrandCode, BrandName, BrandURL, GoodsCnt, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #SiteCode#, #BrandCode#, #BrandName#, #BrandURL#, #GoodsCnt#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TBrandInfo SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, SiteCode = #SiteCode# , BrandCode = #BrandCode# , BrandName = #BrandName# , BrandURL = #BrandURL# , GoodsCnt = #GoodsCnt# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
